text: Carvel is an American ice cream franchise. It is owned by Focus Brands. It operates a chain of 320 ice cream outlets. It is best known for its soft-serve ice cream and ice cream cakes, which feature a layer of distinctive "crunchies". It also makes a variety of novelty ice cream bars and ice cream sandwiches. It was founded in 1929. Category:American restaurants Category:Ice cream brands Category:1929 establishments in the United States
title: Carvel (franchise)
